Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MC=12.5 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=3.1 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) (MIC=25 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=6.3 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=100 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from the skin of the endangered frog Odorrana ishikawae.
Literature.Author: Iwakoshi-Ukena E, Ukena K, Okimoto A, Soga M, Okada G, Sano N, Fujii T, Sugawara Y, Sumida M.
